short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you directly create a wish on whathat using the currently opened tab url as the link for the wish

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension let you directly open Wanthat with the 'add wish' modal already loading the current tab URL so you can easily add new wishes to your account
